title: Mori No Hashikko No Chibi Majo-San
alternative_title: 森の端っこのちび魔女さん@COMIC ; Mori no Hashikko no Chibi Majo-san @COMIC ; Little Witch at the Edge of the Forest
status: 森の端っこのちび魔女さん@COMIC ; Mori no Hashikko no Chibi Majo-san @COMIC ; Little Witch at the Edge of the Forest
description:
Description :
        Running through a small forest in search of new knowledge and a teacher. This is a road story of a young but skilled apothecary girl who ventures out into the world.
